content: CPF Savings Retirement AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018What tools would you recommend to a 38 year old who has just started the journey of investing to attain financial freedom ?1 answerAnswerBump0

Jim NgLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 09 Nov 2018What is your risk profile? Does the investment portfolio form a large part of your net worth? Does investing income form a huge part of your income?Determine your risk profile first.Low risk profile: SSB, FD, Endowment Plans, Corporate Bonds, STI ETF, CPF SAMid risk profile:Small cap, mid cap stocks, blue-chip stocks, unit trustsHigh risk profile:Options, CFDs, Forex 0 comments2
